Class ServerEditor

  • java.lang.Object
    • Activity
      • se.lu.nateko.edca.ServerEditor

  • public class ServerEditor
extends Activity

Can also activate the currently displayed connection. * *

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int EXPLODED_ADDRESS_MODE
      Constant identifying the exploded address mode, where the server address has to be entered as separate parts.
      private int mAddressMode
      Flag showing whether or not to use simple address mode, only requiring a single combined address.
      private java.lang.Boolean mEditsEnabled
      Whether editing is locked (true) or enabled (false).
      private java.lang.Long mRowId
      The row id in the local SQLite database of the currently displayed ServerConnection, or -1 if a new ServerConnection is created.
      private BackboneSvc mService
      A reference to the application's background Service, received through the IBinder passed to the ServiceConnection after the Activity has bound to the Service.
      private ServiceConnection mServiceConnection
      Defines the callback for Service binding, passed to bindService().
      private java.lang.String[] mTempText
      String array holding previous input to be rewritten into the EditText boxes.
      static int SIMPLE_ADDRESS_MODE
      Constant identifying the simple address mode, where the entire server address is entered as a single input String.
      static java.lang.String TAG
      The error tag for this Activity.

      ServerEditor() 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      private boolean checkText(java.lang.String[] text)
      Checks the return String array from getText() if they are input correctly, and otherwise displays alert dialogs to notify the user.
      void enableEdits(boolean enable)
      Method for enabling or disabling use of the text fields and the simple address CheckBox.
      long getRowId()
      Get method for the RowId of the ServerConnection that is currently viewed by this ServerEditor.
      private java.lang.String[] getText()
      Get method for the text written in the EditText boxes by the user.
      private void noNetwork()
      Alerts the user that a network connection is missing and send the user to the system's Wireless Settings.
      protected void onBound()
      Continuation of the create/resume process, called from onServiceConnected after having bound to the Service.
      void onClickConnect(View view)
      Listener method that sets or clears the active server in the BackboneSvc and makes a getCapabilities request to the active ServerConnection on "connecting".
      void onClickSaveEdit(View view)
      Listener method which is called when the Save/Edit button is clicked, it will save the input text to a new ServerConnection or update an existing one in the local SQLite database.
      void onClickSimpleAddress(View view)
      Listener method which is called when the Simple Address Mode CheckBox is clicked.

      protected void onPause() 
      protected void onResume() 
      protected void onSaveInstanceState(Bundle outState)

      Hides or shows the address fields to show simple or exploded address input mode.
      void setButtonState(int state)
      Method that changes the state of the Save/Edit and Connect buttons.

      Set method for the texts written in the EditText boxes by the user.
      void updateLayout(java.lang.String[] text)
      Method that displays the information on the selected connection in the text fields and sets the fields' and buttons' states.

    • Field Detail

      • TAG

        public static final java.lang.String TAG
        The error tag for this Activity.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • mService

        private BackboneSvc mService
        A reference to the application's background Service, received through the IBinder passed to the ServiceConnection after the Activity has bound to the Service.

      • mServiceConnection

        private ServiceConnection mServiceConnection
        Defines the callback for Service binding, passed to bindService().

      • mEditsEnabled

        private java.lang.Boolean mEditsEnabled
        Whether editing is locked (true) or enabled (false).

      • mRowId

        private java.lang.Long mRowId
        The row id in the local SQLite database of the currently displayed ServerConnection, or -1 if a new ServerConnection is created.

      • mAddressMode

        private int mAddressMode
        Flag showing whether or not to use simple address mode, only requiring a single combined address. 0 means exploded address mode, 1 means simple mode.

      • SIMPLE_ADDRESS_MODE

        public static final int SIMPLE_ADDRESS_MODE
        Constant identifying the simple address mode, where the entire server address is entered as a single input String.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • EXPLODED_ADDRESS_MODE

        public static final int EXPLODED_ADDRESS_MODE
        Constant identifying the exploded address mode, where the server address has to be entered as separate parts.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • mTempText

        private java.lang.String[] mTempText
        String array holding previous input to be rewritten into the EditText boxes.

    • Method Detail

      • onCreate

        protected void onCreate(Bundle savedInstanceState)

      • onResume

        protected void onResume()

      • onBound

        protected void onBound()
        Continuation of the create/resume process, called from onServiceConnected after having bound to the Service.

      • onPause

        protected void onPause()

      • onSaveInstanceState

        protected void onSaveInstanceState(Bundle outState)

      • updateLayout

        public void updateLayout(java.lang.String[] text)
        Method that displays the information on the selected connection in the text fields and sets the fields' and buttons' states.
        Parameters:
        text - Pass in a String array to fill the EditText boxes with previous input.

      • onClickSimpleAddress

        public void onClickSimpleAddress(View view)
        Listener method which is called when the Simple Address Mode CheckBox is clicked. Hides the non-required fields and shows the ones required for the selected mode.
        Parameters:
        view - The View object that was clicked.

      • onClickSaveEdit

        public void onClickSaveEdit(View view)
        Listener method which is called when the Save/Edit button is clicked, it will save the input text to a new ServerConnection or update an existing one in the local SQLite database.
        Parameters:
        view - The View object that was clicked.

      • onClickConnect

        public void onClickConnect(View view)
        Listener method that sets or clears the active server in the BackboneSvc and makes a getCapabilities request to the active ServerConnection on "connecting".
        Parameters:
        view - The view that initiated the call.

      • enableEdits

        public void enableEdits(boolean enable)
        Method for enabling or disabling use of the text fields and the simple address CheckBox.
        Parameters:
        enable - The state to set the text fields and the button to.

      • setButtonState

        public void setButtonState(int state)
        Method that changes the state of the Save/Edit and Connect buttons. Pass in 0 for "Disconnected", 1 for "Connected" and 2 for "Connecting".
        Parameters:
        state - The state to set the Connect Button to.

      • setAddressMode

        private void setAddressMode(int mode)
        Hides or shows the address fields to show simple or exploded address input mode.
        Parameters:
        mode - Pass 1 to show the simple address mode or 0 to show the exploded address mode.

      • getText

        private java.lang.String[] getText()
        Get method for the text written in the EditText boxes by the user.
        Returns:
        A seven field String array with ServerConnection name, simple address, ip, port, path, workspace and date of last use.

      • setText

        private void setText(java.lang.String[] text)
        Set method for the texts written in the EditText boxes by the user.
        Parameters:
        text - A seven field String array with ServerConnection name, simple address, ip, port, path, workspace and date of last use.

      • checkText

        private boolean checkText(java.lang.String[] text)
        Checks the return String array from getText() if they are input correctly, and otherwise displays alert dialogs to notify the user.
        Parameters:
        text - String array returned from the local getText() method.
        Returns:
        True if the inputs are valid.
        See Also:
        The method whose return should be given as input.

      • getRowId

        public long getRowId()
        Get method for the RowId of the ServerConnection that is currently viewed by this ServerEditor.
        Returns:
        The row ID of the ServerConnection being edited.

      • noNetwork

        private void noNetwork()
        Alerts the user that a network connection is missing and send the user to the system's Wireless Settings.
